cast.name: 特拉维斯·米尔斯 Travis Mills

director.name: 特拉维斯·米尔斯 Travis Mills

this_title: A Guide to Gunfighters of the Wild West
introduction: Part of the 12 Western feature films to be made in 12 months during 2020: the film tells the story of Tate Butler, a man who accidentally earns a reputation as a gunfighter after one such duel and must from then out face various gunfighters trying to make a name for themselves by challenging him, while trying to escape this wild life for the girl he loves.
foreign_title: A Guide to Gunfighters of the Wild West
